SECTION_CONTENT: Chemical waste generators must determine whether a discarded chemical is classified as a hazardous waste. Chemical waste generators must also consult local, regional, and national hazardous waste regulations to ensure complete and accurate classification.
REVISED_CONTENT: Product ID:HZ-SAC,Product Description:Sulfuric acid,Storage Location:0003,Storage Location Description:Corrosive Items,Plant:0001,Section Id:13,Section Header:Disposal considerations,Section Content:Chemical waste generators must determine whether a discarded chemical is classified as a hazardous waste. Chemical waste generators must also consult local, regional, and national hazardous waste regulations to ensure complete and accurate classification.
